title: BRIEF-Pengrowth Announces 31 Day Extension Of Its Debt Maturities

BRIEF-Pengrowth Announces 31 Day Extension Of Its Debt Maturities

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 30, 2019 22:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pengrowth Announces 31 Day Extension Of Its Debt Maturities Sept 30 (Reuters) - Pengrowth Energy Corp : * PENGROWTH ANNOUNCES 31 DAY EXTENSION OF ITS DEBT MATURITIES * PENGROWTH WILL CONTINUE OPERATING ITS FREE CASH FLOW POSITIVE BUSINESS AS USUAL * REACHED AGREEMENT FOR EXTENSION OF MATURITY DATE UNDER SECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY & UNDER ITS OCTOBER 2019 SECURED NOTES * REMAINS IN TALKS WITH KEY SENIOR DEBTHOLDERS ANOUT OVERALL TRANSACTION TO ADDRESS MATURITIES UNDER CREDIT FACILITY & SECURED NOTES
